devdoc.details: if ETH price is $3000, both ETH/USDC price and ETH/DAI price will be reported as 3000 * 1e18 by this oracle

getHistoricalTwap(address,address,addres.details: if the _secondsAgoToStartOfTwap period is longer than the current timestamp - first timestamp stored in the pool, this will revert with "OLD"

params._base: base currency. to get eth/usd price, eth is base token
params._quote: quote currency. to get eth/usd price, usd is the quote currency
params._secondsAgoToEndOfTwap: amount of seconds in the past to end calculating time-weighted average
params._secondsAgoToStartOfTwap: amount of seconds in the past to start calculating time-weighted average

returns._0: price of 1 base currency in quote currency. scaled by 1e18
max period can be used to request twap

params._period: period in second that we want to calculate average on

getTwap(address,address,address,uint32,b.details: if period is longer than the current timestamp - first timestamp stored in the pool, this will revert with "OLD"

params._base: base currency. to get eth/usd price, eth is base token
params._period: number of seconds in the past to start calculating time-weighted average
params._quote: quote currency. to get eth/usd price, usd is the quote currency

returns._0: price of 1 base currency in quote currency. scaled by 1e18

getHistoricalTwap(address,address,addres.notice: get twap for a specific period of time, converted with base & quote token decimals

getMaxPeriod(address).notice: get the max period that can be used to request twap

getTimeWeightedAverageTickSafe(address,u.notice: get time weighed average tick, not converted to price

getTwap(address,address,address,uint32,b.notice: get twap converted with base & quote token decimals

userdoc.notice: read UniswapV3 pool TWAP prices, and convert to human readable term with (18 decimals)
